import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Chart } from '../models/Chart'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chart', templateUrl: './chart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chart.component.scss'] }) export class ChartComponent implements OnInit{ boolPopin:boolean = false charts!: Chart[]; percent = 0.75 color = "yellow" ngOnInit(): void { this.charts = [ {id:1, percent: 0.25, day: 'mon'}, {id:2, percent: 0.55, day: 'tue'}, {id:3, percent: 0.45, day: 'wed'}, {id:4, percent: 0.25, day: 'thu'}, {id:5, percent: 0.10, day: 'fri'}, {id:6, percent: 0.90, day: 'sat'}, {id:7, percent: 0.80, day: 'sun'}, ] } showPopin(index: number) { this.boolPopin = true } }
